[~iwasakims], thanks for the link there.

If that is the intended specification then it is not being enforced; but that is a separate issue. Shall I close this JIRA then or re-purpose it?
I'm going to close this as duplicate of HADOOP-3257. There is HADOOP-7945 for the enforcement.
